page.title: 19HOME AND SCHOOL,WITHERNSEA
page.content: My name is Nicholas Long.I am 10 years old and live in Withernsea. I have a sister,Debbie, who will be 6 in August.My mother has just started a new job at Barclay's Bank in Hull while my father works on the docks as a customs officer. I go to Withernsea Junior School which is just down the road from my house. I can walk to school, but other children cycle or have to get a bus. The Junior School was once part of the senior school, and the old junior school is now only used for the infants aged from 4 to 7. There are 360 junior children in 13 classes and also a support unit to help children in Mathematics and English. School starts at 8.55 a.m. and finishes at 3.30 p.m. for lunch. I enjoy school and like living in Withernsea, although it does get a bit crowded in the summer.
